name: Gates and Bridges Preschool
description: Preschool program open to children who are 2 years 9 months or older and operates year-round with most enrollment openings occurring in the early Fall. Children who are ready for our preschool do not need to be fully toilet trained.
fullDescription: Preschool program open to children who are 2 years 9 months or older and operates year-round with most enrollment openings occurring in the early Fall. Children who are ready for our preschool do not need to be fully toilet trained.
